Description:
Detects the execution of netsh commands that configure a new port forwarding (PortProxy) rule

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), omkar72, oscd.community, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Port Forwarding Rule Added Via Netsh.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\netsh.exe' and original_file_name = 'netsh.exe') and ((command like '%connectp%' and command like '%listena%' and command like '%c=%') or (command like '%interface%' and command like '%portproxy%' and command like '%add%' and command like '%v4tov4%') or (command like '%i %' and command like '%p %' and command like '%a %' and command like '%v %')))
